Verses: 1 andriyum, Avar Avargalai Nokki: Inge Nirkiravargalil Silar Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Balaththode Varuvadhaik Kaanummun, Maranaththai Rusipaarppadhillaiyendru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
2 aarunaalaikkup Pinbu, Yesu Pedhuruvaiyum Yaakkobaiyum Yovaanaiyum Azhaiththu, Uyarndha Malaiyinmel Avargalaith Thaniye Koottikkondupoi, Avargalukku Munbaaga Maruroobamaanaar;
3 avarudaiya Vasthiram Uraindha Mazhaiyaippol Boomiyile Endha Vannaanum Velukkakkoodaadha Venmaiyaaip Piragaasiththadhu.
4 appozhudhu Moseyum, Eliyaavum Yesuvudane Pesugiravargalaaga Avargalukkuk Kaanappattaargal.
5 appozhudhu Pedhuru Yesuvai Nokki: Rabee, Naam Inge Irukkiradhu Nalladhu; Umakku Oru Koodaaramum, Mosekku Oru Koodaaramum, Eliyaavukku Oru Koodaaramumaaga, Moondru Koodaarangalaip Poduvom Endraan.
6 avargal Migavum Bayandhirundhapadiyaal Thaan Pesugiradhu Innadhendru Ariyaamal Ippadi Sonnaan.
7 appozhudhu, Oru Megam Avargalmel Nizhalittadhu: Ivar Ennudaiya Nesa Kumaaran, Ivarukku Sevikodungal Endru Andha Megaththilirundhu Oru Saththam Undaayitru.
8 udane Avargal Sutrilum Paarththapodhu, Yesu Oruvaraiththavira Veroruvaraiyum Kaanavillai.
9 avargal Malaiyilirundhu Irangugirapodhu, Avar Avargalai Nokki: Manushakumaaran Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhirukkumvaraikkum, Neengal Kandavaigalai Oruvarukkum Sollavendaam Endru Kattalaiyittaar.
10 mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhiruppadhu Ennavendru Avargal Oruvaridaththil Oruvar Visaariththu, Andha Vaarththaiyaith Thangalukkulle Adakkikkondu:
11 eliyaa Mundhivaravendum Endru Vedhapaaragar Sollugiraargale, Adheppadiyendru Avaridaththil Kettaargal.

12 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Eliyaa Mundhi Vandhu Ellaavatraiyum Seerppaduththuvadhu Meydhaan; Allaamalum Manushakumaaran Pala Paadugal Pattu, Avamadhikkappaduvaarendru, Avaraikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe Adhu Eppadi Endraar.
13 aanaalum Eliyaa Vandhaayitru, Avanaikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkirapiragaaram Thangalukku Ishtamaanapadi Avanukku Seydhaargalendru, Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
14 pinbu Avar Seesharidaththil Vandhapodhu, Avargalai Sutrith Thiralaana Janangal Nirkiradhaiyum, Avargalode Vedhapaaragar Tharkkikkiradhaiyum Kandaar.
15 janangalellaarum Avaraik Kandavudane Migavum Aachchariyappattu, Odivandhu, Avarukku Vandhananjseydhaargal.
16 avar Vedhapaaragarai Nokki: Neengal Ivargalode Ennaththaik Kuriththu Tharkkampannugireergal Endru Kettaar.
17 appozhudhu Janakkoottaththil Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Oomaiyaana Oru Aavi Pidiththa En Maganai Ummidaththil Konduvandhen.

18 adhu Avanai Enge Pidiththaalum Ange Avanai Alaikkazhikkiradhu; Appozhudhu Avan Nuraithalli, Pallaikkadiththu, Sornthu Pogiraan. Adhaith Thuraththividumpadi Ummudaiya Seesharidaththil Ketten. Avargalaal Koodaamarpoyitru Endraan.
19 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Visuvaasamillaadha Sandhadhiye, Edhuvaraikkum Naan Ungalodu Iruppen? Edhuvaraikkum Ungalidaththil Porumaiyaai Iruppen? Avanai Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal Endraar.
20 avanai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal. Avaraik Kandavudane, Andha Aavi Avanai Alaikkazhiththadhu; Avan Tharaiyile Vizhundhu, Nuraithallip Purandaan.
21 avar Avanudaiya Thagappanai Nokki: Idhu Ivanukku Undaagi Evvalavu Kaalamaayitru Endru Kettaar. Adharku Avan: Siru Vayadhu Mudharkonde Undaayirukkiradhu;
22 ivanaik Kollumpadikku Adhu Anegandharam Theeyilum Thanneerilum Thallitru, Neer Edhaagilum Seyyakkoodumaanaal, Engal Mel Manadhirangi, Engalukku Udhaviseyyavendum Endraan.
23 yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Visuvaasikkakkoodumaanaal Aagum, Visuvaasikkiravanukku Ellaam Koodum Endraar.
24 udane Pillaiyin Thagappan Visuvaasikkiren Aandavare, En Avisuvaasam Neengumpadi Udhaviseyyum Endru Kanneerode Saththamittu Sonnaan,

25 appozhudhu Janangal Koottamaai Odivarugiradhai Yesu Kandu, Andha Asuththa Aaviyai Nokki: Oomaiyum Sevidumaana Aaviye Ivanai Vittup Purappattuppo, Ini Ivanukkul Pogaadhe Endru Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren Endru Adhai Adhattinaar.
26 appozhudhu Adhu Saththamittu, Avanai Migavum Alaikkazhiththup Purappattuppoyitru. Avanseththupponaan Endru Anegar Sollaththakkadhaaga Seththavanpolak Kidandhaan.
27 yesu Avan Kaiyaippidiththu, Avanaith Thookkinaar, Udane Avan Ezhundhirundhaan.
28 veettil Avar Piravesiththapozhudhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargal: Adhaith Thuraththivida Engalaal En Koodaamarpoyitru Endru Avaridaththil Thaniththuk Kettaargal.
29 adharku Avar: Ivvagaip Pisaasu Jebaththinaalum Ubavaasaththinaalumeyandri Matrevvidhaththinaalum Purappattuppogaadhu Endraar.
30 pinbu Avvidam Vittup Purappattu, Galileyaavaik Kadanthuponaargal; Adhai Oruvarum Ariyaadhirukkavendumendru Virumbinaar.

31 enenil, Manushakumaaran Manushar Kaigalil Oppukkodukkappaduvaar Endrum, Avargal Avaraik Kondru Poduvaargal Endrum; Kollappattu, Moondraam Naalile Uyirththezhundhiruppaar Endrum Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalukkup Podhagampanni Solliyirundhaar.
32 avargalo, Andha Vaarththaiyai Arindhukollavillai, Adhaikkuriththu Avaridaththil Ketkavum Bayandhaargal.
33 avar Kapparnagoomukku Vandhu, Veettile Irukkumpodhu, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Vazhiyile Edhaikkuriththu Ungalukkulle Tharkkampannineergal Endru Kettaar.
34 adharku Avargal Pesaamalirundhaargal; Enenil Avargal Thangalukkulle Evan Periyavan Endru Vazhiyil Tharkkampanninaargal.
35 appozhudhu Avar Utkaarndhu, Panniruvaraiyum Azhaiththu: Evanaagilum Mudhalvanaayirukka Virumbinaal Avan Ellaarukkum Kadaiyaanavanum, Ellaarukkum Oozhiyakkaaranumaayirukkakkadavan Endru Solli,
36 oru Siru Pillaiyai Eduththu: Adhai Avargal Naduvile Niruththi, Adhai Anaiththukkondu:
37 ippadippatta Siru Pillaigalil Ondrai En Naamaththinaale Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Etrukkollugiraan; Ennai Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Alla, Ennai Anuppinavarai Etrukkollugiraan Endraar.

38 appozhudhu Yovaan Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Nammaip Pinpatraadhavan Oruvan Umadhu Naamaththinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugiradhaikkandom; Avan Nammaip Pinpatraadhavanaanadhaal Avanaith Thaduththom Endraan.
39 adharku Yesu: Avanaith Thadukkavendaam; En Naamaththinaale Arpudhanjeygiravan Elidhaai Ennaikkuriththuth Theengu Sollamaattaan.
40 namakku Virodhamaayiraadhavan Namadhu Patchaththilirukkiraan.

41 neengal Kiristhuvinudaiyavargalaayirukkirapadiyinaale, En Naamaththinimiththam Ungalukku Oru Kalasam Thanneerkudikkakkodukkiravan Than Balanai Adaiyaamarpovadhillai Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
